She i_ not ve__ happy ab___ the fa__ that s__ has t_ spend h__ summer i_ school. She plans to study harder so that she doesn't have to take the course a third time.
data.fullContent: Karen failed her final exam in her Japanese class. This means that she needs to take the class again this summer. She is not very happy about the fact that she has to spend her summer in school. She plans to study harder so that she doesn't have to take the course a third time.
data.answer: 凯伦日语期末考试不及格。这意味着她今年夏天需要再去上课。她不得不在学校度过炎热的夏天，对此她很不高兴。她计划更加努力地学习，这样她就不用上第三次课了。
